nodes.title: SQL Tricks - Getting latest value in Group and Dynamic Week
nodes.excerpt: 1. Getting the latest value along with SUM without window function or CTE I recently had to work on  bid_modifier  data for our Searchâ€¦
nodes.description: Simple hive query tricks to avoid doing lots of steps & typing when getting Getting the latest value of a group (combined with sums of other columns) and dynamic week generation for each date record.
